channel.title: Need client help
channel.description: how do i put a server online..? i have the vps and that and the portforwarding. please answer, i really need help.

item.title: Need client help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You need to go to client.java or gui.java depending on your client, and do a search for “server” you will either see an ip address like 214.64.3.3 for an example or a no-ip such as blablablabla.no-ip.org. You need to change all server ip addresses to your vps ip address.

Also make sure that your server is pointing to the correct port that is ported.

Read full topic
